readable.title: 3425685827_03683e8e5a
readable.content: A group of people sitting in a grassy area under a pink and white blossoming tree . People are sitting at a park under flowering trees . People outside sitting on the grass under cherry blossom trees . The students sitting on the grass are eating a lunch from a red backpack . Young people sit on the grass near a crooked tree with pink blossoms .
